title: Ugliest skin poll
body:
Why did Riot even create some of these skins? I bet because someone had a crazy idea of the ultimate ugly team..

ADC: Warrior Princess Sivir
Supp: Sun Goddess Karma
Mid: Pharaoh Nidalee
Top: Junkyard Trundle
Jungle: Vandal Twitch 

If someone actually did this in a normal game I would love to see the enemy teams reaction, and what these champions would look like when grouped together before a team fight...

replies.body: %%%% b8 m8 i r8 0 you %%%%ing scrub
what are you trying to say?
seems like the sound of Cho'gath choked on Teemo
You baggin on half sock trundle?
I got traditional lee and was pretty disappointed :/ black belt udyr is pretty bad too
Well, they did update the splash art
To be honest, i think that Hillbilly Gragas is probably the most ugliest skin in the history of Gaming. He's already fat enough, and this skin makes him look like he's related to the Blue Whale.
I agree that some of these are in serious need of a splash update (omg the sivir skins are so ugly and distorted). In game models aren't that bad.
